problem_text_cn: 如图,在△ABC中,DE∥BC,D,E分别在AB,AC边上,已知\frac{AD}{DB}=\frac{1}{3},则\frac{DE}{BC}的值为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, D, E are on the edges of AB and AC respectively. It is known that \frac{ AD}{DB} = \frac{N_0}{N_1}, then the value of \frac {DE}{BC} is ()
raw_comment: 本题的是相似三角形的判定和性质,掌握相似三角形的对应边的比等于相似比是解题的关键．
